pageContext.claim: On 2011 U.S. withdrawal from Iraq: "Certainly we shouldn't have left. We should never have left. A vacuum was created and we discussed what happened.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a flip-flop. Trump criticizes the 2011 withdrawal of combat troops from Iraq. But Trump supported rapid withdrawal as early as March 2007, saying the United States should “declare victory and leave.” So Trump criticizes Obama for taking action he advocated.
